meanings.definition: Help or support given to someone in need.
meanings.sent1: The kind aid of the nurse made the patient feel better.
meanings.sent2: The aid of the teacher helped the student understand the lesson.
meanings.sent3: The aid of the friendly neighbor made the difficult situation easier to handle.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a ray of aid in the gloomy day.
meanings.sent5: The aid of the firefighter saved the cat from the tree.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that helps or assists.
meanings.sent1: The aid of the superhero saved the city from disaster.
meanings.sent2: The aid of the tool made the job much easier.
meanings.sent3: The aid of the loyal dog was always appreciated by the family.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like an aid that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The aid of the map guided them safely through the forest.

meanings.sent1: She decided to aid her friend in completing the project.

meanings.sent3: The siblings always aid each other in times of need.
